com.iciql
Interface DbUpgrader

All Known Implementing Classes:
DbUpgrader.DefaultDbUpgrader
public interface DbUpgrader

Interface which defines a class to handle table changes based on model versions. An implementation of DbUpgrader must be annotated with the IQDatabase annotation, which defines the expected database version number.

Nested Class Summary
static class DbUpgrader.DefaultDbUpgrader
          The default database upgrader.
 
Method Summary
 boolean upgradeDatabase(Db db, int fromVersion, int toVersion)
          Defines method interface to handle database upgrades.
 boolean upgradeTable(Db db, java.lang.String schema, java.lang.String table, int fromVersion, int toVersion)
          Defines method interface to handle table upgrades.
 

Method Detail

upgradeDatabase

boolean upgradeDatabase(Db db,
                        int fromVersion,
                        int toVersion)
Defines method interface to handle database upgrades. This method is only called if your DbUpgrader implementation is annotated with IQDatabase.

Parameters:
db - the database
fromVersion - the old version
toVersion - the new version
Returns:
true for successful upgrade. If the upgrade is successful, the version registry is automatically updated.

upgradeTable

boolean upgradeTable(Db db,
                     java.lang.String schema,
                     java.lang.String table,
                     int fromVersion,
                     int toVersion)
Defines method interface to handle table upgrades.

Parameters:
db - the database
schema - the schema
table - the table
fromVersion - the old version
toVersion - the new version
Returns:
true for successful upgrade. If the upgrade is successful, the version registry is automatically updated.
